TopicTitle: Buttons suddenly get a lot smaller

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm get into KSP today and the buttons and readouts to everything are a whole lot smaller, but yesterday they were fine!

Everything is smaller- like the readouts... not kerbin or anything like that. Has this happend to you?
Hmm... maybe the UI scaling got garbled? In game, you can check that in the settings menu.

Try the AnyRes mod to set your screen resolution in the game instead of reloading every time it changes. There's also 4kSP which allows you to dynamically change the sizes of various UI elements in game. I've found that running KSP at a resolution that's different to your PC's display resolution often results in KSP changing its resolution to match the PC's settings if you're in fullscreen mode and switch around to other windows- especially in loading screens; AnyRes can fix that in 2 clicks.
